firstNightReminder: Wake up the Slave and tell them a good player.
otherNightReminder: If the known player dies the Slave may nominate the next day.
name: Slave
ability: You start knowing a good player, if they die you may nominate the next day.

firstNightReminder: Wake up the Influencer and ask if they wish to choose a player, if they do tell that player they can nominate tomorrow.
otherNightReminder: If the influencer has not yet used their ability
name: Influencer
ability: Once per a game, during the night, choose a player: they learn they were chosen and can nominate tomorrow.

firstNightReminder: Wake up the Peasant and have them choose a player.
otherNightReminder: Wake up the Peasant and have them choose a player.  If they were nominated yesterday tell them how many chosen players are not Townsfolk.
name: Peasant
ability: Each night, choose a player you haven't before: If you were nominated yesterday you learn how many players you chose were not Townsfolk.

otherNightReminder: If the majority of alive players were nominated yesterday the Merchant learns an alive character.
name: Merchant
ability: Each night*, if the majority of alive players were nominated yesterday: you learn an alive character.

name: Rancher
ability: Each day, privately learn a number.  Once per game you may learn what all the numbers mean, then you become drunk.

otherNightReminder: If the Counsellor nominated a player yesterday, tell them yes if the nominee was evil or no if they were good.
name: Counsellor
ability: Once per game you may nominate a player, tonight, you learn if they are evil.

otherNightReminder: If the Snooper nominated someone yesterday, show them that player's character.
name: Snooper
ability: On your 1st day, you may nominate a player.  Tonight you learn their character.

otherNightReminder: If the Jester was nominated for the second time yesterday, tell them what Minions are in play.
name: Jester
ability: The 2nd time you are nominated you learn the in-play Minions that night.

name: Scribe
ability: Once per game, ask the storyteller a question that can be answered with a number and learn an equation that produces the correct answer.
attribution: Icon by Made by Made Premium

name: Union Leader
ability: The Demon can't nominate you.  The 1st time you would be nominated by a good player, they instead lose their nomination.

name: Puppet
ability: You think you are the Demon and register as a Demon to Fables.  Evil can't lose.  If the Demon nominates you are drunk.

firstNightReminder: Wake up the Corvee and have them choose a player, if that player is a Townsfolk they are drunk from now on.
otherNightReminder: Wake up the Corvee and have them choose a player, if that player is a Townsfolk they are drunk from now on.
name: Corvee
ability: Each night, choose a player you haven't before (not yourself): If they are Townsfolk they are drunk from now on.

firstNightReminder: Show the Robber a not-in-play Townsfolk token
name: Robber
ability: You have an out-of-play Townsfolk ability.  [+1 Outsider]

otherNightReminder: The Executioner may choose a player, if they do that player dies.
name: Executioner
ability: Twice per a game, during the night*, choose a player: they die.

firstNightReminder: Wake up the Pharaoh and they may choose a player, if they do that player is poisoned.
otherNightReminder: If the Pharaoh has not yet used their ability, wake up the Pharaoh and they may choose a player, if they do that player is poisoned.
name: Pharaoh
ability: Once per game, during the night, choose a player: they are poisoned.  [+1 Outsider]

name: Shadow Ruler
ability: A Townsfolk is instead a Puppet.  Another Townsfolk is instead a Marionette.  [+Puppet, +Marionette]

otherNightReminder: Have the Tyrant choose a player, that player has the abilities of the player the Tyrant nominated and executed yesterday.
name: Tyrant
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they gain the abilities of the player you nominated and executed yesterday tonight and tomorrow.

otherNightReminder: If Anubis has not acted twice, wake up Anubis and they may choose a player, if they do that player becomes drunk and doesn't count towards win conditions.
name: Anubis
ability: Twice per game, at night*, choose a player: they are drunk and aren't included in win conditions.

firstNightReminder: Wake up both Gemini and have them decide who will be even and who will be odd.
otherNightReminder: Wake up Greed and have them decide whether to live or die.
name: Ruling Class
ability: Only the Demon can nominate unless an ability specifies otherwise.  Each day, if at least 1 alive evil player wasn't nominated, evil loses; if no evil players die for three days, evil wins. Only the Demon can nominate themselves.
